attributes.action: Ban all plastic straws and coffee cup lids, as well as single-use plastic items.
attributes.additional_details: Disposable straws are usually made from plastic and plastic never breaks down. As time goes by plastic will separate into smaller and smaller pieces, but never completely biodegrades.
attributes.background: There are plenty of alternatives to disposable plastic straws available. Many retailers today stock glass, stainless steel, and bamboo straws.
